name: TakeOut
description:
It's your first day on the job as a food courier, and in the food delivery industry, ratings are everything! Deliver your food order as fast as you can while navigating winding roads and avoiding shrubbery. The player with the most deliveries when time runs out wins the game!

Controls:

  Red Car - WASD, 'f' to brake

  Blue Car - arrow keys, space to brake

Bugs:

  Occasionally the red car is unable to deliver their food to their assigned house. We are in the process of fixing this.
